name: That's The Spirit! (ChasingShadows)
description: You are a self-proclaimed internet-famous ghost hunter. You recently got into a supernatural Ghost & Ghoul Jamboree. But instead of filming proof of the supernatural, something went terribly wrong… You fell in love! Like, head over heels for the host of the Jamboree. Who is a ghost. Congrats? Now you must make up for your mistakes at the Jamboree and get yourself a boo-tiful partner!
